trans-unit.source: Provides access to the functionality of an installed speech synthesis engine.
trans-unit.target: Gir tilgang til funksjonaliteten til en installert tale syntese-motor.

trans-unit.source: When you create a new SpeechSynthesizer object, it uses the default system voice.
trans-unit.target: Når du oppretter et nytt SpeechSynthesizer-objekt, bruker systemet stemmen standard.

trans-unit.source: To configure the SpeechSynthesizer to use one of the installed speech synthesis (text-to-speech) voices, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A> or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil konfigurere SpeechSynthesizer å bruke en installert tale syntese (tekst til tale) stemmer, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A>eller <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A>metode.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A>

trans-unit.source: To get information about which voices are installed, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A> method and the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo> class.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha informasjon om hvilke stemmer er installert, Bruk <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>metoden og <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo>klasse.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>

trans-unit.source: This class also provides control over the following aspects of speech synthesis: - To configure the output for the SpeechSynthesizer object, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToAudioStream%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToNull%2A>, and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToWaveFile%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen gir deg også kontroll over følgende aspektene tale syntese: - Hvis du vil konfigurere utdataene for SpeechSynthesizer-objektet, bruker du den <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToAudioStream%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToNull%2A>, og <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToWaveFile%2A>metoder.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToWaveFile%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToNull%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToAudioStream%2A>

trans-unit.source: - To generate speech, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A>, or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: -Hvis du vil generere tale, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A>, eller <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A>metode.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>

trans-unit.source: The SpeechSynthesizer can produce speech from text, a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt> or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder> object, or from [Speech Synthesis Markup Language (SSML) Version 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201763).
trans-unit.target: SpeechSynthesizer kan produsere tale fra teksten, en <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt>eller <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder>objekt, eller fra [tale syntese Markup Language (SSML) versjon 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201763).</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt>

trans-unit.source: - To pause and resume speech synthesis, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Pause%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Resume%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: -Hvis du vil stanse og gjenoppta tale syntese, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Pause%2A>og <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Resume%2A>metoder.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Resume%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Pause%2A>

trans-unit.source: - To add or remove lexicons, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.AddLexicon%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.RemoveLexicon%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: -Hvis du vil legge til eller fjerne lexicons, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.AddLexicon%2A>og <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.RemoveLexicon%2A>metoder.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.RemoveLexicon%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.AddLexicon%2A>

trans-unit.source: The SpeechSynthesizer can use one or more lexicons to guide its pronunciation of words.
trans-unit.target: SpeechSynthesizer kan bruke ett eller flere lexicons til å lede uttalen ord..

trans-unit.source: - To modify the delivery of speech output, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Rate%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Volume%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: -Hvis du vil endre levering av tale output, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Rate%2A>og <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Volume%2A>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Volume%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Rate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The SpeechSynthesizer raises events when it encounters certain features in prompts: (<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.BookmarkReached>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.PhonemeReached>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VisemeReached>, and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakProgress>).
trans-unit.target: SpeechSynthesizer starter hendelser når det oppstår enkelte funksjoner i ledetekstene: (<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.BookmarkReached>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.PhonemeReached>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VisemeReached>, og <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakProgress>).</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakProgress> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VisemeReached> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.PhonemeReached> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.BookmarkReached>

trans-unit.source: It also raises events that report on the start (<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted>) and end (<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakCompleted>) of speak operations and on the change of the speaking voice (<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VoiceChange>).
trans-unit.target: Det også opphøyer hendelser som rapporterer på start (<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted>) og (<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakCompleted>) for snakke operasjoner og endring av stemmen (<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VoiceChange>).</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VoiceChange> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakCompleted> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Dispose%2A> before you release your last reference to the SpeechSynthesizer.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Alltid kall <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Dispose%2A>før du slipper siste referanse til SpeechSynthesizer.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the SpeechSynthesizer object's <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Ellers ressurser den bruker vil ikke bli frigjort før saneringsoppsamlingen kaller SpeechSynthesizer objektets <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>metode.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: When you initialize a new <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> instance, it uses the default system voice.
trans-unit.target: Når du initialisere en ny <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>forekomsten den bruker standard system stemmen.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: To configure the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> to use one of the installed speech synthesis (text-to-speech) voices, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A> or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Til å konfigurere den <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>for å bruke en installert tale syntese (tekst til tale) stemmer, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A>eller <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A>metode.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: To get information about which voices are installed, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A> method and the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo> class.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha informasjon om hvilke stemmer er installert, Bruk <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>metoden og <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo>klasse.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>

trans-unit.source: Adds a lexicon to the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Legger til et leksikon til den <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: A pronunciation lexicon is a collection of words or phrases together with their pronunciations, which consist of letters and characters from a supported phonetic alphabet.
trans-unit.target: Et uttale leksikon er en samling av ord eller uttrykk sammen med sin uttaler som består av bokstaver og tegn fra en støttet alfabetet.

trans-unit.source: You can use a lexicon to specify custom pronunciations for specialized vocabulary in your application.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke en leksikon til å angi egendefinerte uttaler for spesialiserte vokabular i programmet.

trans-unit.source: Pronunciations specified in an external lexicon file take precedence over the pronunciations of the speech synthesizer's internal lexicon or dictionary.
trans-unit.target: Uttaler som er angitt i en ekstern leksikon fil overstyrer uttaler tale-synthesizeren intern leksikon eller ordlisten.

trans-unit.source: However, pronunciations specified inline in prompts created with any of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.AppendTextWithPronunciation%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.AppendSsmlMarkup%2A>, or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.AppendSsml%2A> methods take precedence over pronunciations specified in any lexicon.
trans-unit.target: Imidlertid uttaler angitt innebygd i instruksjonene som er opprettet med noen av de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.AppendTextWithPronunciation%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.AppendSsmlMarkup%2A>, eller <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.AppendSsml%2A>metoder overstyrer uttaler som er angitt i en leksikon.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.AppendSsml%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.AppendSsmlMarkup%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.AppendTextWithPronunciation%2A>

trans-unit.source: Inline pronunciations apply only to a single occurrence of a word.
trans-unit.target: Innebygd uttaler gjelder bare for en enkelt forekomst av et ord.

trans-unit.source: See [Lexicons and Phonetic Alphabets](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/435e3c6f-6834-4e5a-b0f6-c17b2275dc51) for more information.
trans-unit.target: Se [Lexicons og Phonetic bokstaver](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/435e3c6f-6834-4e5a-b0f6-c17b2275dc51) for mer informasjon.

trans-unit.source: You can add multiple lexicons to a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> object.Two values are currently supported for the `mediaType` parameter: - The value `application/pls+xml` indicates that the lexicon conforms to the [Pronunciation Lexicon Specification (PLS) Version 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201766).
trans-unit.target: Du kan legge til flere lexicons et <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>-objekt. To verdier støttes den `mediaType` parameteren:-verdien `application/pls+xml` angir leksikon overholder den [uttale leksikon spesifikasjonen (PLS) versjon 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201766).</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred format to use.
trans-unit.target: Dette er det foretrukne formatet du bruker.

trans-unit.source: - The value `application/vdn.ms-sapi-lex` indicates that the lexicon format is Uncompressed Lexicon, which is a Microsoft-proprietary format.
trans-unit.target: -Verdien `application/vdn.ms-sapi-lex` angir at formatet leksikon er ukomprimerte leksikon, som er en Microsoft-proprietary-format.

trans-unit.source: This is a legacy format and we recommend that you use the PLS format described above.
trans-unit.target: Dette er et eldre format, og vi anbefaler at du bruker formatet PLS ovenfor.

trans-unit.source: The location of the lexicon information.
trans-unit.target: Plasseringen av leksikon-informasjon.

trans-unit.source: The media type of the lexicon.
trans-unit.target: Medietypen for leksikon.

trans-unit.source: Media type values are not case sensitive.
trans-unit.target: Mediet typen verdier er ikke mellom store og små bokstaver.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> encounters a bookmark in a prompt.
trans-unit.target: Starter når den <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> støter et bokmerke et spørsmål.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> raises this event while processing any of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A>, or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>forårsaket hendelsen under behandling av noen av de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A>, eller <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A>metoder.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: For information about data associated with the event, see <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.BookmarkReachedEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.BookmarkReachedEventArgs>.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.BookmarkReachedEventArgs> for informasjon om dataene for hendelsen

trans-unit.source: You can add bookmarks using the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.AppendBookmark%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Du kan legge til bokmerker ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.AppendBookmark%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.AppendBookmark%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Disposes the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> object and releases resources used during the session.
trans-unit.target: Disposes den <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> objekt og versjoner ressurser som brukes i økten.

trans-unit.source: Acts as a safeguard to clean up resources in the event that the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Dispose*> method is not called.
trans-unit.target: Fungerer som en beskyttelse å rydde opp i ressursene som den <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Dispose*>ikke-metoden.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Dispose*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the prompt that the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> is speaking.
trans-unit.target: Henter meldingen som den <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> er snakker.

trans-unit.source: Returns the prompt object that is currently being spoken.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer spør objektet som for øyeblikket som data.

trans-unit.source: Returns all of the installed speech synthesis (text-to-speech) voices.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer alle installerte lesingen syntese (tekst til tale) stemmer.

trans-unit.source: A voice is an engine for speech synthesis (text-to-speech or TTS) that is installed on the system.
trans-unit.target: En stemme er en motor for tale syntese (tekst til tale eller TTS) som er installert på systemet.

trans-unit.source: Returns a read-only collection of the voices currently installed on the system.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en skrivebeskyttet samling stemmer som er installert på systemet.

trans-unit.source: Returns all of the installed speech synthesis (text-to-speech) voices that support a specific locale.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer alle installerte lesingen syntese (tekst til tale) stemmer som støtter en bestemt region.

trans-unit.source: If none of the installed voices support the specified locale, this method returns an empty collection.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ingen av installerte stemmer støtte det angitte nasjonale innstillingene returnerer metoden en tom samling.

trans-unit.source: Microsoft Windows and the System.Speech API accept all valid language-country codes.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Windows og System.Speech API godta alle gyldige språket land-koder.

trans-unit.source: To perform text-to-speech using the language specified in the Culture property, a speech synthesis engine that supports that language-country code must be installed.
trans-unit.target: En motor for syntese som støtter denne språket landskoden må installeres på nytt for å utføre tekst til tale på språket som er angitt i egenskapen kultur.

trans-unit.source: The speech synthesis engines that shipped with Microsoft Windows 7 work with the following language-country codes: - en-US.
trans-unit.target: Dikterings-syntese motorer som ble sendt med Microsoft Windows 7 jobb med følgende koder for språket land:-en-US.

trans-unit.source: English (United States) - zh-CN.
trans-unit.target: Engelsk (USA) - zh-CN.

trans-unit.source: Chinese (China) - zh-TW.
trans-unit.target: Kinesisk (Kina) - zh-TW.

trans-unit.source: Chinese (Taiwan) Two-letter language codes such as "en" are also permitted.
trans-unit.target: Kinesisk (Taiwan) to-bokstav språkkoder for eksempel "no" er også tillatt.

trans-unit.source: The locale that the voice must support.
trans-unit.target: Den nasjonale innstillingen stemmen må støtte.

trans-unit.source: Returns a read-only collection of the voices currently installed on the system that support the specified locale.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en skrivebeskyttet samling stemmer som er installert på systemet, og som støtter det angitte nasjonale innstillingene.

trans-unit.source: Pauses the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Stopper det <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Raised when a phoneme is reached.
trans-unit.target: Starter når et fonem er nådd.

trans-unit.source: A phoneme is a basic component of written language, typically a letter of an alphabet (or the combination of two letters) that represents one or more distinct sounds.
trans-unit.target: Et fonem er en grunnleggende komponent med skriftlig språket, vanligvis en bokstav i en alfabetet (eller en kombinasjon av to bokstaver) som representerer en eller flere distinkte lyd.

trans-unit.source: For example, the letter “c” is a phoneme that may sound like “s” in “cinder”, or like “k” in “catch”.
trans-unit.target: Bokstaven "c" er for eksempel et fonem kan lyd som "s" i "cinder", eller som "k" i "catch".

trans-unit.source: A written word is an assemblage of phonemes.
trans-unit.target: Et skriftlig ord er en assemblage over fonemer.

trans-unit.source: Changing a phoneme in a word will alter its spelling.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du endrer en fonem i et word vil endre stavet.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> instance generates a PhonemeReached event for each portion of a word that constitutes a phoneme.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>forekomsten genererer en PhonemeReached hendelse for hver del av et ord som utgjør en fonem.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: For example, for the word “theme” would generate three PhonemeReached events; one for the “th” sound, one for the “e” sound, and one for the “m” sound (me).
trans-unit.target: For eksempel vil ordet "tema" generere tre PhonemeReached hendelser; en for "th" lyden, én for "e"-lyden og én for "m" lyden (me).

trans-unit.source: For an example and information about data associated with the event, see <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PhonemeReachedEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Et eksempel informasjon om dataene som er knyttet til hendelsen, og se <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PhonemeReachedEventArgs>.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PhonemeReachedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the speaking rate of the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir tale i <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Returns the speaking rate of the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> object, from -10 through 10.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer snakker hyppigheten av den <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> objektet fra-10 til 10.

trans-unit.source: Removes a lexicon from the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Fjerner et leksikon fra den <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.AddLexicon%2A> for an example.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.AddLexicon%2A>et eksempel.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.AddLexicon%2A>

trans-unit.source: The location of the lexicon document.
trans-unit.target: Plasseringen av leksikon-dokumentet.

trans-unit.source: Resumes the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> object after it has been paused.
trans-unit.target: Fortsetter du <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> objekt når den er midlertidig stanset.

trans-unit.source: Selects a specific voice by name.
trans-unit.target: Velg en bestemt stemme etter navn.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A> method and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo> class to obtain the names of installed text-to-speech (TTS) voices that you can select.
trans-unit.target: Bruk den <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>metoden og <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo>klassen for å hente navnene på installert tekst til tale (TTS) stemmer du kan velge.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>

trans-unit.source: To select a voice, pass the entire contents of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Name%2A> property as the argument for the SelectVoice method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil velge en stemme, kan du sende hele innholdet i den <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Name%2A>egenskapen som argument for metoden SelectVoice.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> object selects the first installed voice that contains `name` in the voice's <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Name%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>objektet velger første installert stemmen som inneholder `name` i stemmen <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Name%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Name%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> performs a case-sensitive, substring comparison to determine if the voice matches the `name`.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>utfører en skiller delstrengen sammenligning for å finne ut om stemmen samsvarer med den `name`.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: When an application calls <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>, the method verifies that each of the voices it finds in the registry meets certain minimum criteria.
trans-unit.target: Når et program kaller <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>, metoden bekrefter at hver stemmer oppdages i registret oppfyller bestemte minste kriterier.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>

trans-unit.source: For any voice that fails verification, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A> sets its <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A> property to `False`.
trans-unit.target: For alle stemme som mislykkes bekreftelse, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>angir den <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A>egenskapen `False`.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>

trans-unit.source: An application cannot select a voice whose <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A> property is `False`.
trans-unit.target: Et program kan ikke velge en stemme der <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A>egenskapen `False`.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: Typically, applications will not set a voice’s <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Vanligvis programmer ikke angir en stemme <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: To select a voice by gender, age, or locale, use one of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Velg en stemme av kjønn, alder eller nasjonal innstilling ved bruk av <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A>metoder.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name of the voice to select.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på stemmen du velger.

trans-unit.source: Selects a voice with a specific gender.
trans-unit.target: Velg en stemme med en bestemt kjønn.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A> method and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo> class to obtain the names of installed text-to-speech (TTS) voices that you can select.

trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>objektet velger første installert stemmen der <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Gender%2A>egenskapen samsvar i `gender` parameteren.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Gender%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil velge en stemme basert på andre egenskaper, kan du se den andre <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A>metoder.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A>

trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil velge en stemme etter navn, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A> method and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo> class to obtain the names of installed text-to-speech (TTS) voices that you can select.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> object finds installed voices whose <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Gender%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Age%2A> properties match the `gender` and `age` parameters.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> counts the matches it finds, and returns the voice when the count equals the `voiceAlternate` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>teller tilsvarer det oppdager, og returnerer stemmen når antallet er lik den `voiceAlternate` parameteren.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: The gender of the voice to select.

trans-unit.source: The age of the voice to select.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> object finds voices whose <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Gender%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Age%2A>, and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Culture%2A> properties match the `gender`, `age`, and `culture` parameters.

trans-unit.source: Microsoft Windows and the System.Speech API accept all valid language-country codes.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Windows og System.Speech API godta alle gyldige språket land-koder.

trans-unit.source: To perform text-to-speech using the language specified in the `culture` parameter, a speech synthesis engine that supports that language-country code must be installed.
trans-unit.target: Til å utføre tekst til tale på språket som er angitt i den `culture` parameteren, en motor for syntese som støtter språket landskoden må være installert.

trans-unit.source: The speech synthesis engines that shipped with Microsoft Windows 7 work with the following language-country codes: - en-US.
trans-unit.target: Dikterings-syntese motorer som ble sendt med Microsoft Windows 7 jobb med følgende koder for språket land:-en-US.

trans-unit.source: English (United States) - zh-CN.
trans-unit.target: Engelsk (USA) - zh-CN.

trans-unit.source: Chinese (China) - zh-TW.
trans-unit.target: Kinesisk (Kina) - zh-TW.

trans-unit.source: Chinese (Taiwan) Two-letter language codes such as "en" are also permitted.
trans-unit.target: Kinesisk (Taiwan) to-bokstav språkkoder for eksempel "no" er også tillatt.

trans-unit.source: Configures the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> object to append output to an audio stream.
trans-unit.target: Konfigurerer den <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> objektet til å tilføye utdata lyd-dataflyt.

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToNull%2A> to release the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>’s reference to the stream.
trans-unit.target: Kall <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToNull%2A>å frigjøre den <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>'s referanse til dataflyten.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToNull%2A>

trans-unit.source: To release the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>’s reference to the stream, reconfigure the synthesizer's output, for example, by calling <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToNull%2A>.

trans-unit.target: Innholdet snakke.

trans-unit.source: To asynchronously speak a string that contains SSML markup, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil asynkront snakke en streng som inneholder SSML koder, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: To synchronously speak the contents of a string, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil synkront snakke innholdet i en streng, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can cancel the asynchronous speaking of a prompt with the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsyncCancel%2A> or the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsyncCancelAll%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Du kan avbryte asynkrone snakker for en melding med den <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsyncCancel%2A>eller <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsyncCancelAll%2A>metode.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsyncCancelAll%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsyncCancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: The text to speak.
trans-unit.target: Teksten som skal snakke.

trans-unit.source: Returns the object that contains the content to speak.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer objektet som inneholder innholdet for snakke.

trans-unit.source: Cancels the asynchronous synthesis operation for a queued prompt.
trans-unit.target: Avbryter asynkrone syntese operasjonen for en melding i køen.

trans-unit.source: You can also use this method to cancel an asynchronous speak operation for the following: - The contents of a <xref:System.String> specified by a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også bruke denne metoden for å avbryte en asynkron snakke operasjonen for følgende:-innholdet i en <xref:System.String>angitt av en <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metode.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: - The contents of a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder> specified by a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: -Innholdet i en <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder>angitt av en <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metode.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder>

trans-unit.source: - The contents of a <xref:System.String> containing SSML specified by a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: -Innholdet i en <xref:System.String>som inneholder SSML som er angitt av en <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A>metode.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: When you call <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A>, System.Speech creates a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt> object and populates it with the contents of the method's parameter, and returns the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt> object.
trans-unit.target: Når du kaller <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, eller <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A>, System.Speech oppretter en <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt>objekt tabellen fylles ut med innholdet i den metoden parameteren, og returnerer det <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt>objektet.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If you retain a copy of the returned <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt>, you can pass it into SpeakAsyncCancel to cancel speaking content specified in a <xref:System.String> or a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder> object.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du beholde en kopi av det returnerte <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt>, kan du sende den til SpeakAsyncCancel å avbryte snakker innhold som er angitt i en <xref:System.String>eller <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder>objektet.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder> </xref:System.String> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt>

trans-unit.source: The content for which to cancel a speak operation.
trans-unit.target: Innhold som du vil avbryte snakke.

trans-unit.source: Cancels all queued, asynchronous, speech synthesis operations.
trans-unit.target: Avbryter alle i kø, asynkron, tale syntese operasjoner.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> completes the speaking of a prompt.
trans-unit.target: Starter når den <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> er fullført snakker for en melding.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> raises the SpeakCompleted event at the completion of any of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>viser SpeakCompleted-hendelsen på fullføring av noen av de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>eller <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A>metoder.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeakCompletedEventArgs> class has no properties, and does not return data from the SpeakCompleted event.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeakCompletedEventArgs>klassen har ingen egenskaper, og returnerer ikke data fra hendelsen SpeakCompleted.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeakCompletedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: It is provided to enable application authors to write event handlers for the SpeakCompleted event.
trans-unit.target: Det er angitt for å aktivere applikasjonen forfattere å skrive hendelsesbehandling for SpeakCompleted-hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Raised after the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> speaks each individual word of a prompt.
trans-unit.target: Hevet etter den <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> snakker hvert enkelt ord for en melding.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> raises this event for each new word that it speaks in a prompt using any of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A>, or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>viser denne hendelsen for hvert nye ord den snakker bedt om å bruke den <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A>, eller <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A>metoder.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: For an example and more information about data associated with the event, see <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeakProgressEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel og mer informasjon om dataene som er knyttet til hendelsen, kan du se <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeakProgressEventArgs>.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeakProgressEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Synchronously speaks a <xref:System.String> that contains SSML markup.
trans-unit.target: Synkron leser en <xref:System.String>som inneholder SSML markup.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The contents of the `textToSpeak` parameter must include a `speak` element and must conform to the [Speech Synthesis Markup Language (SSML) Version 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201763).
trans-unit.target: Innholdet i den `textToSpeak` parameter må inneholde en `speak` elementet og må samsvare med den [tale syntese Markup Language (SSML) versjon 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201763).

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Speech Synthesis Markup Language Reference](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/0c51279e-84d2-4f73-a924-8832039abf94).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [tale syntese Markup Language referanse](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/0c51279e-84d2-4f73-a924-8832039abf94).

trans-unit.source: Raised when the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> begins the speaking of a prompt.
trans-unit.target: Starter når den <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> starter snakker for en melding.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> raises this event when it begins processing a prompt using any of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A>, or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>forårsaket hendelsen når det begynner å behandle en melding med noen av de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A>, eller <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A>metoder.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeakStartedEventArgs> class has no properties, and does not return data from the SpeakStarted event.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeakStartedEventArgs>klassen har ingen egenskaper, og returnerer ikke data fra hendelsen SpeakStarted.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeakStartedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: It is provided to enable application authors to write event handlers for the SpeakStarted event.
trans-unit.target: Det er angitt for å aktivere applikasjonen forfattere å skrive hendelsesbehandling for SpeakStarted-hendelsen.

trans-unit.target: Henter gjeldende ved å snakke tilstanden til den <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: To get the new state of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> after it changes, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs.State%2A> property of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: Å hente den nye statusen for <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>etter den bruker endringer <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs.State%2A>for <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs>klassen.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs.State%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: Returns the current speaking state of the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer gjeldende snakker status for den <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the state of the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> changes.
trans-unit.target: Starter når tilstanden til den <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> endringer.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> raises this event when its speaking <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.State%2A> changes.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>forårsaket hendelsen når den ved å snakke <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.State%2A>endringer.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.State%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: For an example and more information about data associated with the event, see <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel og mer informasjon om dataene som er knyttet til hendelsen, kan du se <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs>.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: To pause and resume speech synthesis, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Pause%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Resume%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil stanse og gjenoppta tale syntese, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Pause%2A>og <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Resume%2A>metoder.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Resume%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Pause%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Raised when a viseme is reached.
trans-unit.target: Starter når en viseme er nådd.

trans-unit.source: A viseme is the basic position of the mouth and face when pronouncing a phoneme.
trans-unit.target: En viseme er basic plasseringen av munnen og ansikts når pronouncing et fonem.

trans-unit.source: Visemes are visual representations of phonemes.
trans-unit.target: Visemes er synlig i fonemer.

trans-unit.source: System.Speech supports 21 visemes for US English, each of which corresponds to one or more phonemes.
trans-unit.target: System.Speech støtter 21 visemes for engelsk (USA), som svarer til én eller flere fonemer.

trans-unit.source: VisemeReached events are raised when a new phoneme reached has a different corresponding viseme than the previous phoneme reached.
trans-unit.target: VisemeReached hendelser aktiveres når en ny fonem nådd har en annen tilsvarende viseme enn forrige fonem nådd.

trans-unit.source: Since some visemes represent more than one phoneme, a VisemeReached event is not generated if the next phoneme reached corresponds to the same viseme as the previous phoneme.
trans-unit.target: Siden noen visemes representerer flere fonem, genereres ikke en VisemeReached-hendelse hvis neste fonem nådd samsvarer med den samme viseme som tidligere fonem.

trans-unit.source: For example, for the spoken words “this zone”, a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.PhonemeReached> event is raised for the “s” in “this” and the “z” in “zone”.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel for ordene "denne sonen", en <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.PhonemeReached>hendelsen starter for "s" i "Dette" og "z" i "sone".</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.PhonemeReached>

trans-unit.source: However, a VisemeReached event is not raised for the “z” in “zone” because it corresponds to the same viseme as the “s” in “this”.
trans-unit.target: En VisemeReached denne hendelsen oppstår imidlertid ikke for "z" i "sone" fordi den tilhører den samme viseme som "s" i "Dette".

trans-unit.source: The following is a list of the 21 SAPI phonemes and phoneme groups that correspond to a viseme in US English.
trans-unit.target: Følgende er en liste over 21 uspesifiserte ISAPI fonemer og fonem grupper som svarer til en viseme på engelsk.

trans-unit.source: |Viseme|Phoneme(s)| |------------|------------------| |0|silence| |1|ae, ax, ah| |2|aa| |3|ao| |4|ey, eh, uh| |5|er| |6|y, iy, ih, ix| |7|w, uw| |8|ow| |9|aw| |10|oy| |11|ay| |12|h| |13|r| |14|l| |15|s, z| |16|sh, ch, jh, zh| |17|th, dh| |18|f, v| |19|d, t, n| |20|k, g, ng| |21|p, b, m| For information about data associated with the `VisemeReached` event, see <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VisemeReachedEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: | Viseme | Phoneme(s) | |------------|------------------| |&0; | stillhet | |&1; | ae, ax, ah | |&2; | aa | |&3; | ao | |&4; | tastetilordning, ikke sant, eh | |&5; | er | |&6; | y iy, ih, ix | |&7; | u, uw | |&8; | Vis | |&9; | aw | |&10; | oy | |&11; | ay | |&12; | h | |&13; | r | |&14; | l | |&15; | s, z | |&16; | Vis, e-jh, zh | |&17; | th, dh | |&18; | f, v | |&19; | d, t, n | |&20; | k g, ng | |&21; | p b, m | For informasjon om dataene som er knyttet til den `VisemeReached` hendelse, se <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VisemeReachedEventArgs>.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VisemeReachedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets information about the current voice of the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Henter informasjon om gjeldende stemmen for den <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: When you initialize a new <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>, it uses the default system voice.
trans-unit.target: Når du initialisere en ny <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>, den bruker standard system stemmen.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: To configure the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> object to use one of the installed speech synthesis voices, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A> or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Til å konfigurere den <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>å bruke en installert tale syntese stemmer, bruker du <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A>eller <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: To get information about which voices are installed, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A> method and the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo> class.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha informasjon om hvilke stemmer er installert, Bruk <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>metoden og <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo>klasse.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>

trans-unit.source: Returns information about the current voice of the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer informasjon om gjeldende stemmen for den <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the voice of the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> changes.
trans-unit.target: Starter når stemmen for den <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> endringer.

trans-unit.source: For an example and information about data associated with the event, see <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceChangeEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Et eksempel informasjon om dataene som er knyttet til hendelsen, og se <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceChangeEventArgs>.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceChangeEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: You can change the voice that the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> uses with any of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder>'s <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.StartVoice%2A> methods or the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>'s <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A> or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Du kan endre stemmen som den <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>bruker med noen av de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder>'s <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.StartVoice%2A>metoder eller <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>'s <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A>eller <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A>metoder.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.StartVoice%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Get or sets the output volume of the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Får eller angir volumet for den <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Returns the volume of the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref>, from 0 through 100.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer antall den <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref>, mellom 0 og 100.
